_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: ManiaPlanet
author: info@gamemania.org
description: ManiaPlanet Dedicated Server for TrackMania and ShootMania.

installation.script:
#!/bin/sh
# ManiaPlanet Dedicated Server
#
## Vars
DEDICATED_URL="http://files.v04.maniaplanet.com/server/ManiaplanetServer_Latest.zip"
TRACKLIST_URL="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Hoerli1337/pterodactyl-eggs/master/TM2/maplist.txt"
DEFAULT_MAPS_URL="https://github.com/Hoerli1337/pterodactyl-eggs/raw/master/TM2/01_White.zip"
TITLE_PACK_TMStadium="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/TMStadium@nadeo.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_TMCanyon="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/TMCanyon@nadeo.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_TMValley="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/TMValley@nadeo.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_TMLagoon="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/TMLagoon@nadeo.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_SMStorm="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/SMStorm@nadeo.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_SMStormSiege="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/SMStormSiege@nadeolabs.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_SMStormElite="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/SMStormElite@nadeolabs.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_SMStormRoyal="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/SMStormRoyal@nadeolabs.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_SMStormBattle="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/SMStormBattle@nadeolabs.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_SMStormWarlords="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/SMStormWarlords@nadeolabs.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_SMStormCombo="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/SMStormCombo@nadeolabs.Title.Pack.gbx"
TITLE_PACK_SMStormJoust="https://v4.live.maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/SMStormJoust@nadeolabs.Title.Pack.gbx"
USER="container"
WORKDIR="/mnt/server"

mkdir -pv ${WORKDIR}
cd ${WORKDIR}

## Install Stuff
apk add --no-cache --update ca-certificates wget unzip tar bash fontconfig
adduser -D -h /home/container container
## Add a folder for TM-Server
wget ${DEDICATED_URL} -qO ${WORKDIR}/dedicated.zip
unzip -qo ${WORKDIR}/dedicated.zip -d ${WORKDIR}
chmod 775 -v ${WORKDIR}
chown -Rv ${USER}: ${WORKDIR}

## Configuration
# Make sure we use defaults everywhere.
: ${PACKMASK:="TTMStadium"}
: ${DEDICATED_CFG:="dedicated_cfg.txt"}
: ${MATCH_SETTINGS:="MatchSettings/maplist.txt"}
: ${SERVER_NAME:="GameMania.org Trackmania Server"}
: ${TM_SERVER_PORT:="2350"}

# Copy the configuration files if not yet copied.
mkdir -pv ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Config ${WORKDIR}/GameData/Maps/MatchSettings
## {{{ config.txt
if [ ! -f ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Config/${DEDICATED_CFG} ]; then
echo "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>

<dedicated>
	<authorization_levels>
		<level>
			<name>${SUPERADMIN_NAME:-SuperAdmin}</name>
			<password>${SUPERADMIN_PWD:-SuperAdmin}</password>
		</level>
		<level>
			<name>${ADMIN_NAME:-Admin}</name>
			<password>${ADMIN_PWD:-Admin}</password>
		</level>
		<level>
			<name>${USER_PWD:-User}</name>
			<password>${USER_PWD:-User}</password>
		</level>
	</authorization_levels>
	
 	<masterserver_account>
		<login>${MASTERSERVER_ACCOUNT_USER:-}</login>
		<password>${MASTERSERVER_ACCOUNT_PWD:-}</password>
		<validation_key>${MASTERSERVER_KEY:-}</validation_key>
	</masterserver_account>
	
	<server_options>
		<name>${SERVER_NAME:-}</name>
		<comment>
		    ${COMMENT:-}
		</comment>
		<hide_server>${HIDE_SERVER:-0}</hide_server>
		<max_players>${MAX_PLAYERS:-32}</max_players>
		<password>${SERVER_PASSWORD:-}</password>
		<max_spectators>${MAX_SPECTATORS:-32}</max_spectators>
		<password_spectator>${PASSWORD_SPECTATOR:-}</password_spectator>
		<keep_player_slots>False</keep_player_slots>
		<ladder_mode>${LADDER_MODE:-forced}</ladder_mode>
		<ladder_serverlimit_min>${LADDER_SERVERLIMIT_MIN:-}</ladder_serverlimit_min>
		<ladder_serverlimit_max>${LADDER_SERVERLIMIT_MAX:-}</ladder_serverlimit_max>
		<enable_p2p_upload>${P2P_UPLOAD:-True}</enable_p2p_upload>
		<enable_p2p_download>${P2P_DOWNLOAD:-True}</enable_p2p_download>
		<callvote_timeout>${CALLVOTE_TIMEOUT:-60000}</callvote_timeout>
		<callvote_ratio>${CALLVOTE_RATIO:-0.5}</callvote_ratio>
		<callvote_ratios>
			<voteratio command=\"Ban\" ratio=\"0.65\"/>
		</callvote_ratios>
		<allow_map_download>${ALLOW_CHALLENGE_DOWNLOAD:-True}</allow_map_download>
		<autosave_replays>${AUTOSAVE_REPLAYS:-False}</autosave_replays>
		<autosave_validation_replays>${AUTOSAVE_VALIDATION_REPLAYS:-False}</autosave_validation_replays>
		<referee_password>${REFEREE_PASSWORD:-}</referee_password>
		<referee_validation_mode>${REFEREE_VALIDATION_MODE:-0}</referee_validation_mode>
		<use_changing_validation_seed>${USE_CHANGING_VALIDATION_SEED:-False}</use_changing_validation_seed>

		<disable_horns>False</disable_horns>
		<clientinputs_maxlatency>0</clientinputs_maxlatency>
	</server_options>
	
	<system_config>
		<connection_uploadrate>${CONN_UPLOAD_RATE:-90000}</connection_uploadrate>
		<connection_downloadrate>${CONN_DOWNLOAD_RATE:-90000}</connection_downloadrate>
		<packetassembly_threadcount>1</packetassembly_threadcount>
		<allow_spectator_relays>False</allow_spectator_relays>
		<p2p_cache_size>${P2P_CACHE_SIZE:-4000}</p2p_cache_size>
		<force_ip_address></force_ip_address>
		<server_port>${TM_SERVER_PORT:-2350}</server_port>
		<server_p2p_port>${SERVER_P2P_PORT:-3450}</server_p2p_port>
		<client_port>${CLIENT_PORT:-0}</client_port>
		<bind_ip_address>${BIND_IP_ADDRESS:-}</bind_ip_address>
		<use_nat_upnp>${USE_NAT_UPNP:-}</use_nat_upnp>
		<gsp_name>${GAMESERVERPROVIDER_NAME:-}</gsp_name>
		<gsp_url>${GAMESERVERPROVIDER_URL:-}</gsp_url>
		<xmlrpc_port>${XMLRPC_PORT:-5000}</xmlrpc_port>
		<xmlrpc_allowremote>${XMLRPC_ALLOW_REMOTE:-True}</xmlrpc_allowremote>

		<scriptcloud_source>nadeocloud</scriptcloud_source>

		<blacklist_url>${BLACKLIST_URL:-}</blacklist_url>
		<guestlist_filename>${GUESTLIST_FILENAME:-}</guestlist_filename>
		<blacklist_filename>${BLACKLIST_FILENAME:-}</blacklist_filename>
		
		<title>${TITLE_PACK:-TMStadium}</title>

		<minimum_client_build></minimum_client_build>

		<disable_coherence_checks>False</disable_coherence_checks>

		<disable_replay_recording>False</disable_replay_recording>
		<save_all_individual_runs>False</save_all_individual_runs>

		<use_proxy>${USE_PROXY:-False}</use_proxy>
		<proxy_url>${USE_PROXY_URL:-False}</proxy_url>
	</system_config>
</dedicated>
" > ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Config/${DEDICATED_CFG}
fi
## config.txt }}}
## {{{ maplist.txt
wget ${TRACKLIST_URL} -qO ${WORKDIR}/GameData/Maps/${MATCH_SETTINGS}
## maplist.txt }}}

# Download the default Maps, to start the server
mkdir -pv ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Maps/Campaigns/01_White
cd ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Maps/Campaigns/01_White
wget ${DEFAULT_MAPS_URL}
unzip -qo 01_White.zip

# Get all Title-Packs
cd ${WORKDIR}/Packs
wget ${TITLE_PACK_TMStadium}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_TMCanyon}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_TMValley}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_TMLagoon}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_SMStorm}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_SMStormSiege}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_SMStormElite}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_SMStormRoyal}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_SMStormBattle}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_SMStormWarlords}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_SMStormCombo}
wget ${TITLE_PACK_SMStormJoust}

## Cleanup
rm -r ${WORKDIR}/RemoteControlExamples
rm ${WORKDIR}/ListCallbacks_2013-04-16.html
rm ${WORKDIR}/ListCallbacks_2012-06-19.html
rm ${WORKDIR}/ListCallbacks_2011-10-06.html
rm ${WORKDIR}/ListCallbacks_2011-08-01.html
rm ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Config/dedicated_cfg.default.txt
rm ${WORKDIR}/ManiaPlanetServer.exe
rm -rfv /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /var/cache/apk/*
rm ${WORKDIR}/dedicated.zip
rm ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Maps/Campaigns/01_White/01_White.zip

echo "--- Install done! Have fun! ---"

variables.name: Enviroment
variables.description: Change the Enviroment. TMStadium = Stadium, TMValley = Valley, TMLagoon = Lagoon, TMCanyon = Canyon, SMStrom = ShootMania Storm
